snippet: Controversy always seems to trail P. K. Subban, a defenseman for Montreal, and he is bound to be in the middle of the action against the Rangers in the Eastern Conference finals.
abstract: Montreal Canadiens defenseman P K Subban, known for his flamboyant attitude and aggressive style of play, will be in the middle of the action during Eastern Conference Finals against the New York Rangers; Subban has lead team with 12 goals in postseason.

byline.contributor: Allan Kreda contributed reporting from Greenburgh, N.Y.

lead_paragraph: Controversy always seems to trail P. K. Subban, a defenseman for Montreal, and he is bound to be in the middle of the action against the Rangers in the Eastern Conference finals.

headline.main: Producing Goals and Gall for Canadiens
headline.print_headline: Producing Goals and Gall for Canadiens
